arts.ttl: Hansi Flick sounds the alarm as Barcelona face red-hot Celta de Vigo before international break
arts.sum: We want to win and go into the break with three points." Those comments mark a concerning tone for a Barça team struggling to maintain momentum and consistency, especially compared to a surging Celta de Vigo side. FC Barcelona enter Sunday's LaLiga clash against Celta de Vigo with a warning from their own manager.

arts.ttl: Barcelona superstar hungry to complete his La Liga hit list with Celta Vigo in his sights
arts.sum: Barcelona’s teenage sensation Lamine Yamal continues to make headlines with his electric form in front of goal. The 18-year-old forward has been unstoppable in recent weeks, registering three goals and one assist in his last four appearances.
